thread.title: Virginia A. Armstrong
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by Virginia A. Armstrong

author: Virginia A. Armstrong
title: Virginia A. Armstrong
text:
Jeff really helped me schedule my much needed vacation. He was knowledgeable, honest and fun to deal with. I've never done a vacation like this before, but will for sure use them again. And will ask for Jeff especially.
I still have a couple months to go before my vacation but am confident everything will be terrific.
